channel.title: Roadmaps on Light 4J - A fast, lightweight Java microservices framework
channel.description: Recent content in Roadmaps on Light 4J - A fast, lightweight Java microservices framework

item.title: Road Map
item.description: The short term goal is to make sure the API framework production ready. 1.3.0 Remove java from project names as it is a trademark of Oracle 1.4.0 Switch to HTTP/2 for client and server 1.5.0 Support API or Service Hosting
